verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> unto Moses בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> in the wilderness סִינַ֖י <WH5514> of Sinai בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation בְּאֶחָד֩ <WH259> on the first לַחֹ֨דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשֵּׁנִ֜י <WH8145> [day] of the second בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year הַשֵּׁנִ֗ית <WH8145> in the second לְצֵאתָ֛ם <WH3318> after they were come out מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

שְׂא֗וּ <WH5375> Take אֶת־ <WH853> רֹאשׁ֙ <WH7218> ye the sum כָּל־ <WH3605> of all עֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> of all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> with the number שֵׁמ֔וֹת <WH8034> of [their] names כָּל־ <WH3605> every זָכָ֖ר <WH2145> every male לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָֽם׃ <WH1538> by their polls

מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> From twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> all that are able to go forth צָבָ֖א <WH6635> to war בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> in Israel תִּפְקְד֥וּ <WH6485> shall number אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> לְצִבְאֹתָ֖ם <WH6635> them by their armies אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> thou and Aaron

וְאִתְּכֶ֣ם <WH854> for יִהְי֔וּ <WH1961> shall be a אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> And with you there shall be a man אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> of every לַמַּטֶּ֑ה <WH4294> tribe אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> every one רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> head לְבֵית־ <WH1004> of the house אֲבֹתָ֖יו <WH1> of his fathers הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> These שְׁמ֣וֹת <WH8034> And these [are] the names הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> of the men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יַֽעַמְד֖וּ <WH5975> that shall stand אִתְּכֶ֑ם <WH854> for לִרְאוּבֵ֕ן <WH7205> with you of [the tribe of] Reuben אֱלִיצ֖וּר <WH468> Elizur בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שְׁדֵיאֽוּר׃ <WH7707> of Shedeur
לְשִׁמְע֕וֹן <WH8095> Of Simeon שְׁלֻמִיאֵ֖ל <WH8017> Shelumiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צוּרִֽישַׁדָּֽי׃ <WH6701> of Zurishaddai
לִֽיהוּדָ֕ה <WH3063> Of Judah נַחְשׁ֖וֹן <WH5177> Nahshon בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַמִּינָדָֽב׃ <WH5992> of Amminadab
לְיִ֨שָּׂשכָ֔ר <WH3485> Of Issachar נְתַנְאֵ֖ל <WH5417> Nethaneel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צוּעָֽר׃ <WH6686> of Zuar
לִזְבוּלֻ֕ן <WH2074> Of Zebulun אֱלִיאָ֖ב <WH446> Eliab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֵלֹֽן׃ <WH2497> of Helon

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> Of the children יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> of Joseph לְאֶפְרַ֕יִם <WH669> of Ephraim אֱלִישָׁמָ֖ע <WH476> Elishama בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַמִּיה֑וּד <WH5989> of Ammihud לִמְנַשֶּׁ֕ה <WH4519> of Manasseh גַּמְלִיאֵ֖ל <WH1583> Gamaliel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פְּדָהצֽוּר׃ <WH6301> of Pedahzur
לְבִ֨נְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> Of Benjamin אֲבִידָ֖ן <WH27> Abidan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son גִּדְעֹנִֽי׃ <WH1441> of Gideoni
לְדָ֕ן <WH1835> Of Dan אֲחִיעֶ֖זֶר <WH295> Ahiezer בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַמִּֽישַׁדָּֽי׃ <WH5996> of Ammishaddai
לְאָשֵׁ֕ר <WH836> Of Asher פַּגְעִיאֵ֖ל <WH6295> Pagiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עָכְרָֽן׃ <WH5918> of Ocran
לְגָ֕ד <WH1410> Of Gad אֶלְיָסָ֖ף <WH460> Eliasaph בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son דְּעוּאֵֽל׃ <WH1845> of Deuel
לְנַ֨פְתָּלִ֔י <WH5321> Of Naphtali אֲחִירַ֖ע <WH299> Ahira בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֵינָֽן׃ <WH5881> of Enan

אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These [קְרִיאֵי כ] (קְרוּאֵ֣י <WH7148> famous ק) הָעֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> of the congregation נְשִׂיאֵ֖י <WH5387> princes מַטּ֣וֹת <WH4294> of the tribes אֲבוֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers רָאשֵׁ֛י <WH7218> heads אַלְפֵ֥י <WH505> of thousands יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel הֵֽם׃ <WH1992> in

וַיִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> took מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> and Aaron אֵ֚ת <WH853> הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH582> these men הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who נִקְּב֖וּ <WH5344> which are expressed בְּשֵׁמֽוֹת׃ <WH8034> by [their] names

וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעֵדָ֜ה <WH5712> all the congregation הִקְהִ֗ילוּ <WH6950> together בְּאֶחָד֙ <WH259> on the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> [day] of the second וַיִּתְיַֽלְד֥וּ <WH3205> and they declared their pedigrees עַל־ <WH5921> in מִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> according to the number שֵׁמ֗וֹת <WH8034> of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> years וָמַ֖עְלָה <WH4605> and upward לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָֽם׃ <WH1538> by their polls

כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> As the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> Moses וַֽיִּפְקְדֵ֖ם <WH6485> so he numbered בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> them in the wilderness סִינָֽי׃ <WH5514> of Sinai פ

וַיִּהְי֤וּ <WH1961> become בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children רְאוּבֵן֙ <WH7205> of Reuben בְּכֹ֣ר <WH1060> eldest son יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel's תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <WH8435> by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֤ר <WH4557> according to the number שֵׁמוֹת֙ <WH8034> of the names לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָ֔ם <WH1538> by their polls כָּל־ <WH3605> every זָכָ֗ר <WH2145> every male מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <WH6635> to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6485> Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> of them [even] of the tribe רְאוּבֵ֑ן <WH7205> of Reuben שִׁשָּׁ֧ה <WH8337> and six וְאַרְבָּעִ֛ים <WH705> [were] forty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred פ

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> Of the children שִׁמְע֔וֹן <WH8095> of Simeon תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <WH8435> by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers פְּקֻדָ֗יו <WH6485> those that were numbered בְּמִסְפַּ֤ר <WH4557> of them according to the number שֵׁמוֹת֙ <WH8034> of the names לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָ֔ם <WH1538> by their polls כָּל־ <WH3605> every זָכָ֗ר <WH2145> every male מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <WH6635> to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6485> Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> of them [even] of the tribe שִׁמְע֑וֹן <WH8095> of Simeon תִּשְׁעָ֧ה <WH8672> and nine וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <WH2572> [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וּשְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> and three מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred פ

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> Of the children גָ֔ד <WH1410> of Gad תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <WH8435> by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> according to the number שֵׁמ֗וֹת <WH8034> of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <WH6635> to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6485> Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> of them [even] of the tribe גָ֑ד <WH1410> of Gad חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <WH2568> and five וְאַרְבָּעִים֙ <WH705> [were] forty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וַחֲמִשִּֽׁים׃ <WH2572> and fifty פ

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> Of the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <WH8435> by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> according to the number שֵׁמֹ֗ת <WH8034> of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <WH6635> to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6485> Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> of them [even] of the tribe יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah אַרְבָּעָ֧ה <WH702> four וְשִׁבְעִ֛ים <WH7657> seventy אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> and six מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred פ

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> Of the children יִשָּׂשכָ֔ר <WH3485> of Issachar תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <WH8435> by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> according to the number שֵׁמֹ֗ת <WH8034> of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <WH6635> to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6485> Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> of them [even] of the tribe יִשָּׂשכָ֑ר <WH3485> of Issachar אַרְבָּעָ֧ה <WH702> and four וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <WH2572> [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred פ

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> Of the children זְבוּלֻ֔ן <WH2074> of Zebulun תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <WH8435> by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> according to the number שֵׁמֹ֗ת <WH8034> of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <WH6635> to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6485> Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> of them [even] of the tribe זְבוּלֻ֑ן <WH2074> of Zebulun שִׁבְעָ֧ה <WH7651> and seven וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <WH2572> [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred פ

לִבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> Of the children יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> of Joseph לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> [namely] of the children אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> of Ephraim תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <WH8435> by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> according to the number שֵׁמֹ֗ת <WH8034> of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <WH6635> to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6485> Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> of them [even] of the tribe אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> of Ephraim אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> [were] forty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred פ

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> Of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> of Manasseh תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <WH8435> by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> according to the number שֵׁמ֗וֹת <WH8034> of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <WH6635> to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6485> Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> of them [even] of the tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> of Manasseh שְׁנַ֧יִם <WH8147> and two וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <WH7970> [were] thirty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <WH3967> and two hundred פ

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> Of the children בִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> of Benjamin תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <WH8435> by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> according to the number שֵׁמֹ֗ת <WH8034> of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <WH6635> to war
